statements: DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_name = 'Health Check';
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = TRUE AND check_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type = 'Security Check' AND check_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_result = FALSE;
DELETE FROM audits WHERE department_under_audit = 'HR' AND audit_result = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM ComplianceCheck WHERE department = 'Finance' AND check_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Audit WHERE audit_name LIKE '%Internal%' OR auditor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM RegulatoryRequirement WHERE requirement_description IS NULL;
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type = 'Security' AND check_result = 'Failed';
DELETE FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE requirement_id IN (2001, 2002, 2003);
